-- indexOf :: Eq a => [a] -> [a] -> Maybe Int
-- indexOf :: String -> String -> Maybe Int
on indexOf(pat, src)
    if class of src is text then
        set tpl to breakOn(pat, src)
        if 0 < length of (|2| of tpl) then
            Just((length of |1| of tpl) + 1)
        else
            Nothing()
        end if
    else
        script pfx
            on |λ|(xs)
                isPrefixOf(pat, xs)
            end |λ|
        end script
        findIndex(pfx, tails(src))
    end if
end indexOf
